name: The Water of Life
description:
The king, your father is ill. To save him, you have to get the Water of Life. Will you be able to complete the quest and make sure the kingdom falls into the right hands?

A tale of betrayal, love, and a  dwarf with eyes like sapphire.

Narrative Design

Selina Behrens, Samuel Hackl, Anton Schneeberger, Lilith-Isa Samer

Character Development

Selina Behrens

Sound Design, Programming

Lilith-Isa Samer

Art

Anton Schneeberger

Additional Art

Lilith-Isa Samer
